youtube-subscription-promo.landing-body: Stay ahead with the latest updates and World Cup news by subscribing to our YouTube channel. As a token of our appreciation, you'll receive the exclusive YouTube Space Helmet to showcase your support in-game!
youtube-subscription-promo.fail-body: We couldn't verify your YouTube subscription. Please ensure you're subscribed to our channel with the same Google account you used for verification and try again.
youtube-subscription-promo.success-body: The YouTube Space Helmet is yours! Head over to the avatar editor and give it a try.
youtube-subscription-promo.legal-notice: Note: We only use the information from YouTube to be able to process your reward. It's never stored or shared, and we strictly follow {0} (including the Limited Use requirements) for your safety.
